name: vert
description: VERT is a self-hosted dashboard and toolkit for managing and visualizing services and metrics in homelab or small server environments, focused on UX and simplicity.
features: Service dashboard: Visualize and manage homelab services from a centralized dashboard.
Metrics visualization: Display system metrics and service health with charts and graphs.
Simple interface: Navigate an intuitive, user-friendly interface designed for homelabs.
Service management: Start, stop, and monitor services from the web interface.
Status monitoring: Check service status and availability at a glance with visual indicators.
Resource tracking: Monitor CPU, memory, and disk usage across your infrastructure.
Quick access: Access service web interfaces directly from the dashboard with quick links.
Customizable views: Organize services and metrics to match your homelab setup.
Lightweight: Run with minimal resources suitable for small server environments.
Mobile-friendly: Manage your homelab from mobile devices with responsive design.
Easy setup: Get started quickly with minimal configuration and automatic service discovery.
Homelab focus: Designed specifically for homelab and small server use cases.
